participant_1.background:
I come from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
i got married to my highschool friend.
i am a lesbian.
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.
i still love to line dry my clothes.

participant_2.background:
I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.
i like fruit.
My memory of horseback riding last year was so vivid, I can still recall the feeling of the wind in my hair and the smell of the leather saddle.
i do not eat meat.

content.text: Good morning! I hope you had a wonderful night.
Thank you! I did. I spent it riding my horse.
That sounds lovely! I love riding horses.
It is so much fun. I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! I'm from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
That sounds like a wonderful childhood! I love animals too. I have a dog and a cat.
That's so great! I used to have a dog but she passed away a few years ago.
I'm so sorry to hear that. It's hard to lose a pet.
Yes, it is. But I'm glad I had her in my life.
Me too. I'm sure she had a great life with you.
I think she did. She was loved very much.
I'm glad to hear that. I know how important it is to have a pet that loves you.
Yes, it is. They're like family.
